author: ajsutton
content: So a little while back I suggested it would be more efficient for a validator client running multiple validators that are all assigned to the one committee to produce a single aggregated attestation for all those validators instead of publishing each individual attestation.  Turns out, it's explicitly forbidden to gossip aggregated attestations on the attestation subnets.  I can see the advantages of both ideas so ü§∑ .  We're currently publishing single attestations anyway so will just leave it that way.
